name: Tag
description: Tag component is used to categorize content.

value.label: value
value.title: Value to display inside the tag.

severity.label: severity
severity.title: Severity type of the tag. Valid severities are "secondary", "success", "info", "warning", "danger" and "contrast".

rounded.label: rounded
rounded.title: Whether the corners of the tag are rounded.

icon.label: icon
icon.title: Icon of the tag to display next to the value.

pt.label: pt
pt.title: Used to pass attributes to DOM elements inside the component.

unstyled.label: unstyled
unstyled.title: When enabled, it removes component related styles in the core.
